price: ይጎነጨዋል፤ ሊውጠውም አይቀርብም፡፡ ሞትም ከየስፍራው ሁሉ ይመጣበታል፤ እርሱም የሚሞት አይደለም፡፡ ከስተፊቱም ከባድ ቅጣት አለ፡፡
arabic: يَتَجَرَّعُهُۥ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُسِيغُهُۥ وَيَأۡتِيهِ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٖ وَمَا هُوَ بِمَيِّتٖۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِۦ عَذَابٌ غَلِيظٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yatajarraʿuhu walā yakādu yusīghuhu wayatīhi al-mawtu min kulli makānin wamā huwa bimayyitin wamin warāihi ʿadhābun ghalīẓun
